𓆱 𓏏 𓏤||posterior| achter (low german / dutch): behind,beyond
𓈌 𓏏 𓏤 #ꜣḫt Achter 𓈌
𒂕 EĜER אָחוֹר acħer agter achter •aghter > "after"
𓇥 𓂋 𓀜 | end, hinder |
atrás behind @ Portu ⇔ detrás

אחורי acħeri behind
acħ ⇔ ass "behind" ?
acħt ⇔ 𓆱 Ast h₃ósdos ոստ ost ὔσδος úsdos ὄζος ózos!

უკან uḳan behind
